candidates.title: Child Marriage As A Major Concern in Pashto Poetry
candidates.summary: Child marriage is a major concern we read in Pashto poetry. They believe fewer financial resources left people in desperate need to survive, and it has caused both girls and boys to pay the price. Poor parents give away their girls to wealt
candidates.primary_use: Needs maintainer review before promotion to verified catalog.

pashto_evidence.evidence_text: Matched by explicit Pashto marker in paper title from Semantic Scholar search.
